name: Mecha Run 3D
description:
It’s prime time. Are you ready to be a transformer?

Choose to be a mecha robot or a car. Run like a robot or drive like a fast car.

Beat obstacles and pass crazy levels to save the planet.

Go and become the best transformers ever created!
publishers: ZERO SUM TEKNOLOJI YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
